backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing building management ERP with user authentication, role-based access control (binaSahibi/yetkili/sakin), building/apartment/announcement/fault management, and invite code system with authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four high-confidence features related to fixing post-authentication routing, user profile fetching, defensive checks in dashboards, and onboarding flow handling with associated test IDs and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing authentication flow, role-based routing, dashboard components, invite code management, and utility functions with comprehensive console logging for debugging.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode CSS variables for background, foreground, primary, secondary, destructive, border, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Turkish title 'Bina Yönetim ERP Uygulaması' that loads the React application via main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application with TanStack Router, Internet Identity authentication, role-based routing logic (owner/manager/resident dashboards), comprehensive console logging for debugging, and protected route handling with profile fetching.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementCrea: Form component for creating announcements with title and description fields, validation, loading states, and success/error toast notifications using shadcn/ui components and Turkish labels.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementsLis: Displays a list of announcements with loading, error, and empty states. Shows announcement title, description, creation date, and creator principal in card format.
frontend/src/components/ApartmentCreateF: Form component for creating new apartments with a name/number input field. Handles form submission, validation, and displays success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/ApartmentsList.t: Displays all apartments in a table format showing apartment name and creation date. Includes loading skeleton, error handling, and empty state.
frontend/src/components/BuildingCreateFo: Form component for creating a new building with name input. Handles validation, submission with loading state, and triggers optional success callback.
frontend/src/components/BuildingUsersLis: Displays all building users in a table with their principal, name, role badge, and assigned apartment. Includes loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/DaireGorunumu.ts: Visual grid view of apartments showing occupancy status, occupant names, and creation dates. Uses hover cards for additional details and color-codes occupied vs vacant units.
Manages invite code creation and display based on user role permissions. Shows existing codes with copy functionality and allows creating new codes for authorized roles (binaSahibi, yetkili, sakin).
frontend/src/components/InviteCodeRegist: React component for registering users with a 16-character alphanumeric invite code. Validates input, displays role-specific messages, and handles registration via mutation hook with success/error toasts.
Form component for reporting building maintenance issues with title, description, and apartment selection. Submits issue reports via mutation hook and displays success/error feedback.
frontend/src/components/IssuesList.tsx: Displays a table of open maintenance issues with apartment, reporter, status, and creation date columns. Shows loading skeletons and error states while fetching data.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper component with navigation header, content outlet for child routes, and footer with copyright and caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Role-based navigation component with desktop and mobile menus, filtering menu items by user role (owner, manager, resident). Includes logout functionality and active route highlighting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Invalidates dependent queries when actor changes and initializes access control with admin token.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle. Provides authentication status and identity to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, buildings, invite codes, apartments, announcements, and maintenance requests. Includes hooks for creating buildings, managing invite codes, and CRUD operations on various entities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components like sidebar, cards, buttons, and charts using HSL color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component into the DOM root.
frontend/src/pages/Announcements.tsx: Announcements page component that displays building announcements with priority badges, allows authorized users (building owner/authority) to create new announcements, and shows mock data with role-based access control.
frontend/src/pages/BuildingMembers.tsx: Building members page that displays statistics and a list of building members derived from invite codes, showing member roles, join dates, and role-based access restrictions.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page showing welcome message, user status cards (active status, login info, principal ID), and system information with special handling for first-time logins.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page component managing onboarding flows for different user roles (building owner, authority, resident), displaying building statistics, invite code panels, and role-based content with session storage integration.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page with three user type options (building owner, authority, resident) that stores the selected onboarding flow before initiating Internet Identity authentication. Redirects authenticated users to home.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerDashboard.tsx: Dashboard for authority/manager users displaying building overview, invite code statistics, and an issues list. Shows loading states and error alerts for missing profile or building data.
frontend/src/pages/OwnerDashboard.tsx: Comprehensive dashboard for building owners with statistics cards, invite code management, building users list, apartment creation/management, announcements, and apartment view components. Includes loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: User profile page displaying principal ID, authentication method (Internet Identity), session date, account status, and user role with translated display names.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentDashboard.tsx: Dashboard for resident users showing building overview, role information, announcements list, and issue report form. Displays warning if apartment assignment is missing.
frontend/src/pages/Users.tsx: Placeholder users list page with table structure for displaying all system users and their roles. Shows development notice that backend endpoint is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/utils/roleTranslations.ts: Provides utility functions to translate Role enum values to Turkish display names (Bina Sahibi, Yetkili, Sakin) and map them to UI badge variants (default, secondary, outline).
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, typography, container queries, animations, and design tokens for a multi-tenant building management application.
project_state.json: Project metadata for a Turkish multi-tenant building management ERP system using Internet Identity authentication, documenting architectural decisions, known onboarding flow state management issues, and implemented features with incremental development strategy.
